
1.2.2 / 2014-02-10
==================

  * package: rename to "component-domify"
  * package: update "main" and "component" fields
  * package: use 2 space tabs
  * component: remove redundant "scripts" array entry

==================

 * fix leading/trailing whitespace in text nodes

==================
